responsibilities: Build and maintain data lake and big data pipelines/services.
Facilitate the movement of billions of messages each day.
Work directly with business stakeholders and platform/engineering teams to enable growth and retention strategies.
Help stakeholder teams ingest data faster into the data lake.
Improve data pipelines efficiency and instigate self-serve data engineering.
Build micro-services, architect, design, and enable self-serve capabilities at scale.
Identify ways to make data usable and improve user experience.
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The Job Responsibilities focus on building and maintaining data pipelines, facilitating data movement, and improving data usability. There is no mention of working with language models or tasks related to fine-tuning or customizing them. The responsibilities are more aligned with data engineering rather than language model development.
